类 FSHLogProvider

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    WALProvider

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class FSHLogProvider
extends AbstractFSWALProvider<FSHLog>
    A WAL provider that use FSHLog.
